record.condition: ($L.streamlined=false or (jscall("streamlinedSDService.getFulfillCfg", category in $L.file)="interaction" or $G.bg=true or jscall("streamlinedSDService.isInteractionFulfilled", $L.file)=false)) and $L.tableAccess.update and active in $L.file=true and not (same(approval.status in $L.file, "denied")) and (nullsub($G.ess, false)=false or nullsub($G.src, false)=true) and (jscall("ServiceDeskSwitch.getSDSwitch")=false or jscall("sdUtil.isSDLinked", incident.id in $L.file)=true or nullsub(escalate in $L.category, false)=false and category in $L.filed~="service catalog") or nullsub($update.incident.ws, false)
record.condition.txt: ($L.streamlined=false or (jscall("streamlinedSDService.getFulfillCfg", category in $L.file)="interaction" or $G.bg=true or jscall("streamlinedSDService.isInteractionFulfilled", $L.file)=false)) and $L.tableAccess.update and active in $L.file=true and not (same(approval.status in $L.file, "denied")) and (nullsub($G.ess, false)=false or nullsub($G.src, false)=true) and (jscall("ServiceDeskSwitch.getSDSwitch")=false or jscall("sdUtil.isSDLinked", incident.id in $L.file)=true or nullsub(escalate in $L.category, false)=false and category in $L.filed~="service catalog") or nullsub($update.incident.ws, false)
